instances module¶

This module contains instances and its groups of classes in personage module.

platform

Linux

author

Ovod18

FUNCTIONS

new_mob()

OBJECTS

all_sprites

mobs

bullets

player


instances.all_sprites = <Group(1 sprites)>¶

The group of all sprites.


instances.bullets = <Group(0 sprites)>¶

The group of all bullets.


instances.mobs = <Group(0 sprites)>¶

The group of mobs.


instances.new_mob()¶

Generating new instance of class Mob in personage module.


instances.player = <Player Sprite(in 1 groups)>¶

The instance of class Player in personage module.
